metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11416 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: jpegoptim.c in jpegoptim 1.4.5 (fixed in 1.4.6) has an invalid use ofrealloc() and free(), which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: jpegoptim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
